raw akas.title: Eiga Kôkai Kinen! Ichi Funkan Sutôrî
Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories

akas: Eiga Kôkai Kinen! Ichi Funkan Sutôrî (original title)
Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Eiga Kôkai Kinen! Ichi Funkan Sutôrî (original title)
Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories World-wide (English title)

1.title: Kurimu Sutainberuto no Shin I wa nani ka

episode of.title: Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

1.plot: Eiji Tomari tries to record a warning message to people who live in 2015, but he encounters a trio of Roidmudes, who lure him out of his hiding place.

2.title: Nisensanjûgo-nen no Mirai wa donna Sekai na no ka

episode of.title: Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

2.plot: While finding a hiding place, Eiji was called by his colleague to jump to 2015 to prevent a dystopian timeline from happening in their time, using a time machine together but warns to hurry up as it won't last much longer.

3.title: Jikan no Michi o Hiraku no wa dare ka

episode of.title: Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

3.plot: Eiji jumping towards the portal that will lead him to travel back to the past and hopefully prevent the birth of the dark future of the year 2035.

4.title: Tomari Eiji wa Itsu no Jidai ni Tadoritsuita no ka

episode of.title: Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

4.plot: Eiji finds himself in August 5, 2015 in the past. He knows that at this time, Krim will control Shinnosuke/Drive and forces him to destroy a portion of the city, framing his father in the process.

imdb.title: Kamen Rider Drive: Movie Roadshow Commemoration! 1 Minute Stories
